1.content:
Jack wakes up scared, alone, confused as he realises that he has been shrunk down to a 1cm,

“I can’t believe this is happening” said Jack “I wanted to shrink bu....” *STOMP*.

Jack hears a giant booming noise who is it.
1.title: Wake Up

info.brief_description: You shrunk Shrink yourself, now you must suffer by your unaware family PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who wish to be shrunk so you can do extraordinary things and go one adventures, one day he wakes up in a strange environment that turns out to be your massive bedroom.

FAMILY
1). Jennifer - Your mother (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000098/mediaviewer/rm2780266753)
2). Jon - your father (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0358316/mediaviewer/rm2388763136)
3). Anya - your older sister (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5896355/mediaviewer/rm684391680)
4). Toni - your aunt (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001057/mediaviewer/rm3899181312)
5). Katherine - your cousin (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm7692698/mediaviewer/rm2852030209)
6). Ana - Your maid/nanny (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1869101/mediaviewer/rm2784986881)

RULES:
1). Keep It Unaware (If They Do Find Him He Is A Bug Or Toy)
2). Any Thing Sexual Goes (No Poop)
3). You Can Do Absurd Things
4). You Can Have Male Interaction (Especially Couples)
5). No Deaths
6). Describe What Their Wearing (Or Try To Use Images To Show What Their Wearing)
